name: website-api
description: Serverless back-end for Case Consulting website

scripts.build:invoke:apply: npm run build && npm run invoke:apply
scripts.build:invoke:upload: npm run build && npm run invoke:upload
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy:packaged:test
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy:packaged:prod
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=dev ClientProtocol=http ClientDomain=localhost:8080 --stack-name website-api-dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:packaged:test: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=test ClientDomain=app-website.netlify.com --stack-name website-api-test --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:packaged:prod: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=prod ClientDomain=www.consultwithcase.com --stack-name website-api-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.invoke:apply: sam local invoke ApplyFunction --env-vars env.json --event events/apply.json
scripts.invoke:upload: sam local invoke UploadFunction --env-vars env.json --event events/upload.json
scripts.precommit: npm run eslint && npm run test
